评论详情: This PRETTYGARDEN Women's Two Piece Outfit is the perfect combination of comfort and style. The soft and breathable fabric feels amazing against my skin, making it ideal for relaxing at home. The sleeveless top and matching sweatpants are both stylish and comfortable, and the set looks effortlessly chic. I love that it's perfect for lounging around the house or traveling, and I feel confident and comfortable wearing it. This outfit has quickly become one of my favorite go-to options for everyday wear.

评论概述: All the style of a jumpsuit with ease of seperates.
评论详情: I love it. Super soft fabric, with the perfect weight. I found it fits true to size and didn't stretch out when wearing. I loved that it looks like a jumpsuit, but with out the hassle. (Would be great for air travel.) I wore it to the movies with a cardigan and was perfectly comfy. Then later with cute sandals and with denim jacket. I will probably invest in another color.

I purchase this for my travel outfit to Mexico. I wanted something comfortable but light well still looks stylish. I purchased the black in a small. Fits true to size This outfit did not disappoint. Perfect for airport lounging and I felt cute in it.  I’ve had it for a month and have worn it close to 4-5x. However now the fabric is pilling and fading and the waist band has rolled/twisted. I did purchase it in sale for close to $20 so I’m not to upset that it hasn’t lasted long. I’m going to keep trying to untwist the waist band and hope to get some more wear out of it.

Bought this set for a recent trip to Portugal. We were going to be on a long train ride for several hours and it was the perfect outfit as it was very comfortable. Great price, true to size (I am 5’4”, 120lbs). Lots of cute color options. Would recommend.

评论概述: Soft, but waist band is uncomfortable.
评论详情: I am 5'4', 120 lbs, small chested,  pear shape, I got a Medium. Bottoms fit, top it too large. Ok to lounge in and run errands, and the matching makes you look more presentable. The material is very soft and comfortable, but cheap, the waist band is a little uncomfortable.  For the price and the matching I would recommend, however if you have sensitive skin the waist band may irritate you.  If you could mix and match sizes I would have given 4 stars, but for my pear shape gals with smaller chest this may not work for you.
Comfortable two piece set that is lightweight but not too thin. Very happy I decided to purchase this for our upcoming vacation.

评论概述: I'll be buying this in every color!
评论详情: I have found my new wardrobe staple. This set is so comfortable and looks cute too! You really can't tell that it is 2 pieces--it looks just like a jumpsuit. You get the style of a jumpsuit/romper and the ease of a two-piece (no more weird stripping down in the bathroom). Win-win! I feel like I'm wearing pajamas all day when I'm in this set but it's cute enough that I can go about town and run my errands without people thinking I'm wearing pajamas. You can pull the leg up higher on your calf for a sportier look or let them fall naturally. I'm 5'9" and cuff falls about 2.5 inches above my ankle.  As far as it being flattering? I mean, it's an elastic waistband with pockets so you're going to have a little bit of hip action happening but it's nothing major. I've also noticed that underwear lines are somewhat obvious but honestly, who cares about that anymore? Not me!  I tend to be a medium but Amazon recommended I order a large and that was definitely the right choice. So I'd suggest going with what Amazon recommends for you as well.  I ordered the blue but will absolutely be ordering more in the other colors. People in my life should be prepared to see me in this set, in all the colors, all of the time. Even as the temperatures fluctuate, this is an adaptable look. I am currently wearing this with a cardigan and sneakers since it's a little cooler here today and it looks just as cute as with no sweater and sandals.  I have not yet washed this so how durable it is remains to be seen. I plan to gentle wash and line dry...which is annoying but I don't want this to be altered at all so I'm willing to suck it up and line dry.  Excuse me now...I need to go buy the remaining colors.

评论概述: Wish you could order separate sizes for top & bottom
评论详情: I bought this for travel. It’s cute & nice quality. I returned because the top fit great, but bottoms were too baggy.

This outfit is the perfect combo of comfort & style. Traveling from cool weather to warm, just throw on a sweater or long cardigan & once you land in warm sunny weather ditch the sweater & soak up the sun. Highly recommend. This outfit is easy to wear when you want to look put together but also comfortable. For reference I’m 5’4, 125 lbs. and the small fits great.
I like that it is versatile and comfortable for any casual wear situation.
I bought this outfit to wear while traveling. It is so comfortable and doesn’t take out much room when packing.

Thought it was capri-style based on the picture, but it ended up being long pants just pushed up a bit which was disappointing. That being said, it’s really cute, pockets almost big enough, not too thick of material, nice value, stretches with movement, and great for wearing around the house. Four stars only for the fabric which sometimes get oddly itchy (take note, fellow sensory issue ladies) and for the length.

评论概述: Fabric disappointing and it runs big
评论详情: As far as I'm concerned, this item is a pajama set.  I would not wear it out.  The fabric is too thin, and the fit is not at all tapered.  Would not purchase more of these.

I love the look of jumpsuits but hate going to the bathroom while wearing them (especially in public restrooms).  This tank top and jogger set gives the appearance of a jumpsuit but the convenience of a two piece outfit. As another reviewer stated, the armholes were smaller that what was shown on the model but the top still fits (just barely...see pictures).  Also, the listing says the fabric is 65% polyester and 35% cotton but the tag sewed onto the tank top and jogger says it's 65% polyester, 30% viscose, and 5% elastane (in other words, all synthetic).  I haven't washed it yet so will update my review if it comes out a faded mess.  I don't think it picks up lint/hair more than any other product cotton or polyester fabric.I bought the small and it just fits me.  I'm 5'4" and the pants hit just at my ankle.  I'm 137 lbs and normally wear tops in size small and bottoms in 27-28 or size 6-8.

I really like this, enough that I bought it in two colors. The only things I would say against it are that it's high waisted and I don't think I really knew that, and the medium was a tiny bit snug in the butt and legs where large was too big so I guess that's just me.  I stuck with the medium. I love this to travel in, comfy and I just throw a denim jacket over it and it's cute.

This two piece outfit is very cute and comfy but I'm a little too short for the pants. They would fit better on someone taller. The top fit perfectly. Perfect for travel but a little bit too close to pajamas.
Ok material. Dont dry
The outfit is so cute but cheaply made. It fits well and is breathable. It felt like I was wearing my pajamas. But the quality is poor. It pilled after the second wash.

评论概述: There is no cotton content in this.
评论详情: Set arrived timely. It is very soft and love how it fits. I’m about 5ft 2, 110lbs, bra size 34B and the size small fits perfect. The only issue I have with this cute set, is the fact that description says there’s 35% cotton but item I received has the following contents only: 65% polyester, 30% viscose, and 5% elastane. I won’t return it bc it fits very well and it’s soft. But do feel a bit mislead into thinking there was some cotton which is the fabric I was looking for.
The material is very soft and comfortable. This is not your typical sweat material, it’s lightweight and loose fitting. I look forward to wearing as loungewear during cooler weather.

Coverage, wash, and wear seems great! I would consider this true size and it fits exactly like you see in the picture. Size up if you like a looser fit. Will order again.  I am 5'8" / 170-175lbs (depending on the day!) and ordered a L. I use this in the tropics as a walkabout nightset (not heavy, bit covering enough for rainy season or A/C chills).

This looks a very cute on. It hangs just right and fits just right. I melt down on the floor and got up after a while. I figured that the knees would be stretched but they were not. It is stretchy, but the game shape. Good quality fabric.  Could be on a little dressier or a very casual  I like it so much that I’m ordering another color.
Cute but runs small. I would personally go up 2 sizes.

I've been wanting an outfit like this for so long and I finally found one! This is one of the most comfortable outfits that I own. The material is nice and seems to be very good quality and thickness. It stretches just enough, but not too much. It's perfect for this time of the year when the fall is starting and I'm sure it'll be perfect for the springtime too. I will likely buy more sets of this!
I’m planning to buy another one since I tore the button on the previous one but this is so comfortable & fits so well!
I traveled in this. Wrinkle resistant, very comfortable, breathable.  Quality is good washed well.  Got lots of compliments on my color blue. I think it will be versatile.
Love this set. Pants fit great, but top seems to run a bit small.

Cheaper material than I expected but still comfortable and cute- I purchased for a 9 hr plane ride and I think it will be a great fit for travel, while still looking put together with a cardigan 🤷🏼‍♀️ - from the package the fit was TTS - I’ll let you know after a wash

The quality of the fabric is so so it’s a polyester Visco mix blend. The elastic waistband all twisted so I have to straighten that out.  It’s t pretty much true to size. I am 5’6”  140lb and ordered a size medium. This not  something I would wear out fabric is very lightweight thin. It’s good for around the house.

Very comfy and soft. Size small fits like xs IMO which still worked for me. Color of the medium blue a little brighter than expected but fit and quality better than expected.  Wouldn’t wear out and about but great for around home.

This is a great casual set to throw on for almost anything. I wear often for running errands, shopping,  casual lunch. Looks great with sneakers or flip flops. I get lots of compliments. I have in black also
Wore this on an international trip! So soft. So comfy! Fit great!  Not see through! I wore the green and my wife wore the black!
Super cute and comfy, great for flying!

I was looking for a comfortable set to wear on a long plane ride, going from cool weather to hot.  This fit the bill perfectly! The material is soft, stretchy and (for me) very lightweight.  The sleeveless top is amazing.  I'll be able to remove my jacket right off the plane and enjoy the sun.  I bought an XL in size.  The fit was absolutely perfect, roomy but not baggy.  Material is quality.  I'm 5'8", 212 lb.  I find it's very helpful to include the measurements.  I bought the set in green and am going to buy more colors.  So lightweight it's great for spring/summer.

So color was amazing. The pants though, no one wants every tiny bit of bumps and lumps showing when they walk... these pants do nothing for the butt. My man is a butt man and when he's looking at mine in pants I want it to be appealing.

So I purchased this because I love the idea that it looks like a one piece romper that they sell, but it is two pieces because the one piece just doesn't sit right on my body where this one looks so much better. I have a shorter torso so the one piece makes me look odd, where this one I adjust the height of the bottoms on me to look better. It is very soft and true to size, I am 5'2" and 128lbs, a small was exactly right.

I love the style and fit of the two piece outfit, however, the material started pilling the first time I wore this.  Would have bought other colors if they used better material and had more colors to select from.

评论概述: Okay if you aren’t leaving the house!
评论详情: I was disappointed in this outfit. It just didn’t lay right. The material felt cheap. I will keep for indoor cleaning or yard work

The material for this is thin. Like, pajama thin. As a matter of fact, I have summer pajamas that are off the same weight and material. These do have pockets, so that's a bonus. They're just the right weight for sleeping in a cool room or to throw on for a quick run for coffee or to walk the dog.
Very cute set, great gray, cozy and cute
Comfortable set. Slightly oversized. Length is good as I am 5’10”. The only issue was a hole in the pants pocket.

I bought this in Large. I'm 5' 8" and 155 lbs.  I bought it for plane travel. It is very comfortable and perfect for the cold plane and then still nice when landing somewhere warm.  I like that the arm holes aren't too big.  Pants were perfect length and the drawstring waist allows you to cinch in so it looks flattering.
Wore to fly to Florida and it was ridiculously comfy! I refuse to travel in anything other than outfits like this now. Buying in multiple colors if I can!
Super soft and light weight.  Fits great.  5 ft 7 in 165 and got a large.  Even the top with my Dd fit great.
Cute and comfortable. I would definitely buy more.

Love that this is a two piece but looks like a jumper. It is comfortable, true to size and flattering. I received several compliments. Great vacation outfit that can be worn with tennis shoes or dress it up with sandals and a kimono for dinner.  True to size.

I am on vacay and ordered it while away. Came the next day. I adore that it's 2 pieces, but looks like a jumpsuit without the hassle of taking the whole thing off to use the bathroom. It's so comfortable and versatile as you can also wear both pieces separately. Adore it!
Love the outfit the fit and the price.  You can dress it up or wear it casual, soooooo nice.  Feels so soft on your body.  I love it so much that I actually bought a few different colors.

I love this thing, in fact I am sure this is the second one I bought, but can’t find the one I got last year in my closet - so bought another - don’t tell my husband haha.Two pieces so easy bathroom breaks for disgusting airport and plane bathrooms.  Fits comfy true to size and not too long in the legs for my 5’3 frame.  I think it looks nice without being uncomfortable while I dig snacks and kindles out of backpacks the entire flight and “make some memories.”

I love everything about this outfit. Honestly I would wear it out on a casual day running errands or meeting friends for coffee. If you tuck in the top just a bit it looks just like a jumper without the inconvenience when you go to the restroom, lol. This also perfect for a casual day at home when you just want to be comfortable.
Extremely comfortable and light weight. Really comfy to travel in or wear around the house. Great quality for the cost and 2 pieces

评论用户: Just tried it on. It fits just right. It's soft & comfortable.
评论概述: For my height it's not oversized.
评论详情: Just tried it on. It feels so good & soft & comfortable waist area is just right not tight. Fits perfect for my height I'm 5' 1-1/2. Weight 148.

I purchased these pants with the objective of finding something comfortable during my long flight to South Africa. I was surprised not just with the quality but how comfortable they are. Planning on getting more. Love them.

评论概述: You get what you pay for
评论详情: I was headed to the beach and wanted a comfortable outfit that I could throw on for going to vineyards, etc. This was cute and since we were in the midst of a heat wave looked cool and comfortable. I wore it twice and the waistband twisted to the point it cannot be fixed. Ridiculous. I should have known better. Buyer beware.
I bought to wear on the plane and believe me, I had a long journey. The outfit was cute and comfortable. My regret is that I wish I had purchased 2 sets instead of one.

Love this fit and the blue is perfect. I’m 5’6” 190 lbs and this is a Medium. I do have thicker legs so don’t think I would raise the bottoms like joggers but included a pic to see. I also bought the Large in gray so that fits a bit looser but keeping both!
I purchased this to travel in.  It will be my go to anytime I fly or I’m traveling on a road trip.

I'm so in love with this. I'm 5'7", 172 lbs, bought a large and it's the bomb. I am going to order this in every color. I've got big hips and butt, wear about a 10/12 in pants, hips 45". The large wasn't too tight, actually slimmed me down. Color is great. Material super soft.
I bought this outfit to wear on a trip but it is so small. It looks like leggings not a jumpsuit. I don’t have time to send it back. I am done ordering clothing from Amazon. It’s a hit or miss.

I got the Heather gray. I’m 5’10”, 160 lbs. fit is fine. The arm holes of the sleeves are tight enough that your bra doesn’t show. The gray just really looks like pajamas, and I was hoping for something a little less lazy looking. Maybe a different color would be better.
This outfit is so comfortable. Fits nice. True to size. I purchased a medium 5’5 147lb. Love this. I purchased 2 different colors
Fabric is light and good quality. Fits as described and very flattering. So comfortable.
Love the color. Love the concept. Unfortunately it's more like pajamas and will end up being that.

I’m 5’3”, weigh ~120lbs, ordered a size small. Fits well! The arm holes are a bit small, but M would’ve been too big. So I thought this was a one-piece when I ordered, guess I should’ve read the description better! I still love it. I got a lightening deal on it ($30) but I think the original $39.99 is too pricey. It’s very lightweight so don’t expect it to be super warm. It’s perfect for spring/summer!
I like it a lot

It is adorable yes, but the fabric is very thin. Very much like pajamas. I would expect this type of quality to be about $25 for the set. Bottom fit is a little small Tank fit is a little big Super cute for travel outfit. Would be very comfortable on a plane but just not for me

评论概述: Poor quality.  Hole in leg before wearing
评论详情: The two piece is super cute but it had a hole in the back of the leg.  Not at a seam, and before I ever wore it.  Will be returning.

This is my go to end of school year outfit— I have it in a bunch of colors. It’s comfortable but looks cute. It looks like a jumpsuit, but the fact that it’s two pieces makes it even more practical. Soft, comfortable material, elastic waist, pockets… It’s a win!

Love this outfit. Fits true to size, it’s stylish but not snug fitting like many similar sets. Great for separates or a set. Only problem is that, although the tags were still on it,  the outfit had clearly been worn before because there was deodorant stains on the arms.
I loved the outfit However, I have the body shape that needs a medium pant but large top.
Prefer long sleeves, but very comfortable.

LIKE! Very light fabric, great for summer. The green o ordered is beautiful and I’m going to get other colors. I would not go with a color too light, in case you can see too much—beware of panty-lines. I’m not sure how it will wash, but optimistic.

Thin pajama material. Very soft and comfortable but I wouldn’t wear out of house. Also felt like the bottoms were too small, but if it was a thicker material I would’ve kept and paired with a different top
Thought it was a romper, but actually it is a tank top and lounge pants
Nice and soft
Love it, it's just my style! Fairly loose fit for size small and I'm 5'7" 125lbs 34c. Very comfortable and washes well!

I ordered this for a travel outfit to wear with a long cardigan on an overnight flight. I'm a solid medium, but I was swimming in these pants! They were ridiculous. I ordered a small thinking they would surely be too tight, but they fit well.
Great weight and fit. Perfect for travel.
My hubby thought it was a one-piece jumper, which was a success!  Great color (blue), so I hope it stays bright through washings. Seems to be well-made.
I’m 5’7 & 155lbs, wearing a large! I probably could’ve sized down to a medium but the overall fit is amazing. Super light weight, and comfy. Great for travel or lounging!

Fits TTS. Quality of fabric isn’t great. Looks worn after one wash but great to lounge in or travel in and looks cute on. Wouldn’t order again but I would if the fabric were a little nicer. Not thick, very breathable.
Potential to be a cute set… for people over 5’5? I’m 5’2 and the pants were ridiculously long!
I wore this set today with a pair of Van's. I love the lightness of it, pockets is always a plus for me. I've good luck with the length of the pants. Love it!

评论概述: I really wanted to like this! =/
评论详情: Overall, I like the material/feel and I loved the color (Army Green). The fit/neckline of the sleeveless top was great too. I wish they were sold separately, because I would keep the top and/or buy more colors. For reference, I'm 5'11" and in the 155-165 range and ordered a Medium, the top fits pretty true, and the length of the pants was accurate, but the bum/thighs are very baggy.  I dislike the pants, they do not drape well, they look like Men's pajama pants. If I drape them low on the waist for a slouchy look, the thigh/bum area looks way too baggy and I feel they make my legs/thighs look bigger than they are. If I pull them up higher on my waist/hips, it also doesn't look right and the top doesn't drape as well over the pants either. The fly area/yoke area is too long.  I will be returning this outfit, I had high hopes that this would be an easy outfit to throw on for errands or even presentable enough to go out in, but it looks way too casual/pajama-like and does not fit like the advertised pics. I read a lot of the reviews and was encouraged by all the different body types that were satisfied and looked cute in this outfit, but it's not for me, unfortunately.
Bought this specifically to wear on a five hour flight.  Great fit, comfortable.  Ordered two more in different colors!  I’m petite and it’s hard to find a good length.  This is perfect!

I bought this in grey last minute for a trip as an outfit to wear in the airport. It was perfect. The fabric is thin enough that you wont be hot but light enough that you’ll still be warm in the air conditioning. I was concerned I would look like I was in pajamas, but I felt it looked appropriate especially with a little sweater to pull the outfit together.

This is the most comfortable outfit ever. I just got it yesterday, wore it all day, slept in it and was already dressed for today lol. I will have to see how it holds up in the wash, but I'll be wearing this on the plane for our next trip for sure. I was on the fence b/t medium and small and very happy I went with the medium. For reference, I'm 5'2, 36D and weigh 137lbs. A small would have been way too tight on top. If I had a smaller chest, a small would probably work. I'm just happy the medium looks flattering and not too baggy. Ordering another one today!
Cute for spring, summer and early fall.
I get tons of compliments on this every time I wear it. I dress it up.  I dress it down. Looks good both ways.

I originally purchased a medium. I am 5’ 5”, 135 lbs, bust 34F. I planned on wearing this outfit on 2 nine hour flights and 2 eight hour train rides. The waist on the medium is too tight to be comfortable on these trips, but would be fine otherwise. I then bought a large and it is perfect.

I have three sets of the Pretty Garden 2 piece short sleeved sets  and LOVE them. When I saw the sleeveless option I knew I wanted it as well. I ordered the dark grey and it is a great color. I work from home and wanted an option that provided some warmth in AC without being hot. This set is slightly different from the short-sleeved sets. The material is slightly thicker, but maybe softer. The fit of the top is different as well. The sleeveless shirt is more fitted, different from the short-sleeve which is more boxy and loose. Overall I like the set.

Bought this for travel - no one wants their jumper top touching the floor of an airport/airplane toilet so the two pieces are A MUST. Super comfortable, looks cute with a jean jacket and a variety of shoes.  Very versatile as I was able to mix/match the top and pants separately with other items in my suitcase to go farther. Ran into a lady at security wearing the same one - she also loved it. Might buy another to wear around the house and run errands in.
This blue is fantastic.  Super comfy, looks cute.light weight. True to size. I'm 5'2" and 120, small fits great.

So this one is just meh for me. It’s super cute in the advertising pics, looks good on but the fabric isn’t exactly soft but isn’t exactly stiff. It feels kind of like pajamas to be honest but I wouldn’t sleep in it because the pants are strangely long and I’m 5’7”. I wore it for airline travel and wasn’t self conscious or uncomfortable but overall it’s a lounge outfit, not a Sunday brunch outfit or really something you could dress up or style as the fabric is just kind of meh. Feels sort of cheap, but not poly/rayon cheap, more like cotton/wool cheap? I don’t know how to describe it. It’s not awful but not something I’d buy again.

At 5'4 and 140 lbs the length was just right. I would have preferred a more capri look personally. I could of maybe even got a size small as I prefer a little tighter fit over baggy. The top was actually perfect and I'm a 38C.  If the seller sold the tops alone I would buy all the colors as I've been looking for tops just like these and just can't find any. Now the real reason I'm returning is the fact that the set makes me feel like I'm wear pajamas or loungewear. I really wanted some thing comfortable that I could wear on a plane or running errands. Even my daughter thought they were pajamas.  It is very soft and comfrotable, just not what I was looking for. Hopefully the seller could sell the tops without the pants, then I would love that!

Bought this set for a long travel day to avoid wearing leggings & it did not disappoint! Side pockets were fine for putting chapstick & my phone in while whizzing through the airport. Once returning home it has quickly become my go to for lazy days on the couch & it still looks great to wear out for quick errands with a hoodie. Love it so much I bought another set in a different color. Fit is true to size. I’m usually a 12 pant, large top & the set in large was perfect.
Love the comfort and color of this outfit.  I plan on wearing it for airplane travel.

Amazon suggested I order a large in this outfit but after reading reviews I decided to size down to a medium. So glad I did!!! I’m 5’5” around 165 lbs and the pants still are a little roomy however, the top is a little more fitting and not as roomy as the model makes it appear to be. I suppose that is due to my size D chest! So overall I love the comfort of the outfit, but would probably just wear it to run to the store, lounge in at home or even PJ’s rather try to dress it up to go out in.
The quality is very good

评论概述: You need this in every color!
评论详情: This set is so so soft and comfy. It’s also flattering. Can be dressed up or down. Can literally wear as pjs or out for a night out! Pair it with a denim jacket and sneakers or a blazer and heels.
